openerSection: SBI Card launched BPCL SBI Card Octane in December 2020. It is an upgraded version of the BPCL SBI Credit Card. While the Octane variant does offer better rewards and offers, it also carries a much higher annual fee of Rs. 1,499 whereas the other variant had a fee of Rs. 499 only. BPCL SBI Card Octane gives you 7.25% value back on fuel purchases at Bharat Petroleum fuel stations: 6.25% as reward points (25x reward rate) along with a 1% as fuel surcharge waiver.

You also get 10x reward points for spends on dining and movie tickets apart from the fuel benefits. As far as travel benefits are concerned, the card entitles you with 4 complimentary access to domestic airport lounges every year (max 1 per quarter).

If you travel a lot by car or motorbike, this is probably one of the best offerings in the market right now as you get quite a high reward rate of 6.5% (and 1% surcharge waiver) on fuel spends at all BPCL stations across the country (the 1% surcharge waiver is applicable even at non-BPCL stations). Keep reading to know more about the Octane card.

Welcome Benefits: 6,000 bonus RPs as a joining benefit, and every year the membership is renewed (provided the annual fee is paid).
Movie & Dining: 10x reward points for every Rs. 100 you spend on dining and movie tickets.
Rewards Rate: 25 reward points for every Rs. 100 spends at BPCL fuel stations (reward rate = 6.25%), 10 RPs for every Rs. 100 spends on groceries, departmental stores, and movie ticket purchases (reward rate = 2.5%), and 1 reward point for every Rs. 100 spent for all other expenditures (reward rate = 0.25%) except mobile wallet uploads and fuel purchases at non-BPCL stations.
Reward Redemption: Redeem reward points for gift vouchers on sbicard.com or on SBI mobile app, for transactions at BPCL petrol stations, and against card's statement balance. 4 reward points = Re. 1.
Domestic Lounge Access: 4 complimentary access to domestic lounges every year (1 per quarter).
Zero Liability Protection: No liability to the cardholder if the loss of the card is reported to the bank within stipulated time.

Spend based Waiver: Next year's renewal fee waived on annual expenditure of Rs. 2 lakh.
Rewards Redemption Fee: Rs. 99 (plus applicable taxes) per redemption request.
Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions up to Rs. 4,000 (max waiver of Rs. 100 in a month)
Cash Advance Charge: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount (subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 500)
